title: 《MINECRAFT官方2017年度手册》发售
author: 混乱
txt_content:
517HBO1JcJL.jpg (68.88 KB, 下载次数: 11)

下载附件

2016-11-28 15:32 上传





虽然写的是2017年，不过在亚马逊等多个线上商城已经可以见到该书籍的销售页了。

本书介绍：

《MINECRAFT官方2017年度手册》用于祝贺游戏及其社区。
The official Minecraft Annual 2017 is a celebration of the game and its community. 

在里面你会发现由Mojang团队以及著名的油管主播，如“Stampy Cat”和“FyreUK”设置的挑战。
Inside you'll find challenges set by the Mojang team as well as famous YouTubers like Stampy Cat and FyreUK.

有生存战略和挑战，故事模式和领域的功能和循序渐进的指南，由最喜欢的油管主播指导的如何重建世界。
There are survival strategies and challenges, Story Mode and Realms features and step-by-step guides to recreate builds from your favourite YouTubers' worlds. 

你可以了解Minecraft改变世界的方式，从慈善的Block-by-Block基金会，到史诗MineCon事件。
And you can read about the ways in which Minecraft has changed the world, from the charitable Block-by-Block foundation, to the epic MineCon event. 

随着所有这一切，更多的，Minecraft粉丝将享受到由Minecraft官方带来的2017年度。
With all this and more, Minecraft fans will be enjoying the official Minecraft Annual well into 2017.



消息来自-亚马逊.cn
